await deployer.getBalance();
const [deployer] = await ethers.getSigners();
const contract = await Contract.attach("0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512");
const Contract = await ethers.getContractFactory("EcomiraToken");
.exit
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("CoinToken", "0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80")
.exit
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("CoinToken", "0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80")
await contract.yourFunction()
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("YourContract", "0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80")
